stickyBar.text: Discover our games and apps - Play now!

hero.headline: Welcome to CrystalGames Studio
hero.subheadline: Innovative games and cutting-edge apps that combine passion with technology. Explore our collection of web games and desktop applications.
hero.backgroundSvg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 800 800' className='w-full h-full opacity-20'><defs><linearGradient id='crystal-grad' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#4F46E5;stop-opacity:0.3'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#A855F7;stop-opacity:0.3'/></linearGradient></defs><!-- Crystal --><path d='M400,100 L450,150 L425,200 L375,200 L350,150 Z' fill='url(#crystal-grad)' stroke='#ffffff30' stroke-width='2'/><!-- Gamepad --><path d='M300,300 L500,300 L520,400 L280,400 Z' fill='url(#crystal-grad)' stroke='#ffffff30' stroke-width='2'/><circle cx='350' cy='350' r='15' fill='#ffffff20'/><circle cx='450' cy='350' r='15' fill='#ffffff20'/><rect x='380' y='330' width='40' height='10' fill='#ffffff20'/><!-- Hero Character --><path d='M600,200 L650,250 L650,350 L600,400 L550,350 L550,250 Z' fill='url(#crystal-grad)' stroke='#ffffff30' stroke-width='2'/><circle cx='600' cy='270' r='20' fill='#ffffff'/><circle cx='600' cy='270' r='5' fill='#fff'/><circle cx='600' cy='270' r='15' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.2'><animate attributeName='r' from='15' to='30' dur='2s' repeatCount='indefinite'/></circle></svg>

features.headline: What Makes Us Different
features.subheadline: Discover the unique features and innovations across our games and applications.

items.title: Innovative Games
items.description: From arcade adventures like School's Out! to exciting coin-collecting challenges, our games offer unique mechanics and engaging gameplay

items.title: Powerful Apps
items.description: EgraTor Browser combines modern Electron technology with neumorphism design, delivering a beautiful and functional browsing experience

items.title: Cross-Platform
items.description: Our web-based games work seamlessly on desktop and mobile, while our desktop apps provide native performance and features

items.quote: School's Out! is addictively fun and challenging! The unique mechanics keep me coming back.
EgraTor Browser has become my go-to browser. Beautiful design and great functionality!
Coin Collector is perfect for quick gaming sessions. Simple yet engaging gameplay!

items.question: What types of games does CrystalGames Studio create?
items.answer: We create a variety of web-based games including arcade adventures, puzzle games, and action-packed experiences. Our games focus on unique mechanics and engaging gameplay.

items.question: Are your games suitable for all ages?
items.answer: Most of our games are designed to be family-friendly and suitable for players of all ages. We focus on creating fun, engaging content without mature themes.

items.question: Can I play your games offline?
items.answer: Our games are primarily web-based and require an internet connection to play. However, some features may work offline once initially loaded.

items.question: Do you have multiplayer games?
items.answer: Currently, our games are primarily single-player experiences. We're always exploring new game mechanics and multiplayer features for future releases!

items.question: How often do you release new games?
items.answer: We're constantly working on new projects! While we don't have a fixed release schedule, we aim to surprise our community with fresh content regularly.

items.question: Can I stream or record gameplay?
items.answer: Absolutely! We encourage content creators to stream and share gameplay of our games. Feel free to create videos, tutorials, or live streams.

items.question: Are there achievements or leaderboards?
items.answer: Many of our games feature scoring systems and leaderboards. Check each game's features page for specific details about achievements and competitive elements.

items.question: What makes your games unique?
items.answer: We focus on innovative mechanics, beautiful design, and player engagement. Each game features something special, whether it's unique controls, creative challenges, or innovative features like Morse code combos.

items.question: Can I request features or give feedback?
items.answer: Yes! We love hearing from our community. Visit our contact page or join our WhatsApp channel to share your ideas and feedback with us.

items.question: Do you plan to release games on mobile app stores?
items.answer: While our current games are web-based, we're exploring options for native mobile apps. Stay tuned for updates on our social media channels!

items.question: What is CrystalGames Studio?
items.answer: CrystalGames Studio is a game development company focused on creating innovative games and applications that combine passion with technology. We're dedicated to delivering unique gaming experiences.

items.question: When was CrystalGames Studio founded?
items.answer: We're a growing studio passionate about creating quality games and apps. Our team is committed to innovation and community engagement.

items.question: What is your mission?
items.answer: Our mission is to create exceptional gaming and application experiences that combine innovative technological solutions with creative entertainment that engages and inspires players worldwide.

items.question: How can I join your team?
items.answer: We're always looking for talented individuals who share our passion for gaming and technology. Contact us through our contact page to learn about current opportunities.

items.question: Do you work with other developers?
items.answer: We collaborate with talented developers, artists, and creators. If you're interested in partnership opportunities, reach out to us through our contact page.

items.question: What technologies do you use?
items.answer: We use modern web technologies for our games, Electron for desktop applications, and cutting-edge frameworks to deliver the best possible experience.

items.question: Where are you located?
items.answer: CrystalGames Studio operates as a digital-first company. We have a global reach and work with team members and players from around the world.

items.question: How can I stay updated with your latest news?
items.answer: Follow us on X (@CrystalStudio64), subscribe to our YouTube channel, or join our WhatsApp community channel for the latest updates and announcements.

items.question: Do you participate in game jams or events?
items.answer: We actively participate in the gaming community through various events and activities. Follow our social media to see where we'll be next!

items.question: What are your future plans?
items.answer: We're constantly working on new games, improving existing ones, and developing innovative applications. Our roadmap includes exciting features and new titles that we can't wait to share!

items.question: What platforms are your games available on?
items.answer: Our games are web-based and playable on both desktop and mobile devices through your browser. No installation required - just open and play!

items.question: Are your games free to play?
items.answer: Yes! Most of our games are free to play. We offer optional in-game purchases for cosmetic items and enhancements, but the core gameplay is always accessible.

items.question: How do I start playing School's Out!?
items.answer: Simply visit the School's Out! page and click 'Play Now'. Use spacebar to jump, manage your energy, and try Morse code combos with the Enter key for bonuses!

items.question: How do I play Coin Collector?
items.answer: Use arrow keys to move your character, collect all coins on each level, avoid obstacles, and reach the exit to complete the level. Check our Game Guide for detailed instructions!

items.question: Do your games save progress?
items.answer: Many of our games feature automatic save functionality using browser local storage. Your progress, scores, and achievements are saved automatically.

items.question: Can I reset my game progress?
items.answer: Yes, you can usually clear your browser's local storage or use in-game reset options if available. Check the settings menu in each game for reset options.

items.question: Are there in-game purchases?
items.answer: Some games offer optional in-game purchases for cosmetic items, character skins, boosters, or premium content. These are always optional and never required to enjoy the game.

items.question: Do you have controller support?
items.answer: While our games are primarily designed for keyboard/mouse and touch controls, some may support gamepads. Check individual game pages for controller compatibility information.

items.question: Can I play on mobile devices?
items.answer: Absolutely! Our web-based games are fully responsive and optimized for mobile browsers. You can play on smartphones and tablets with touch controls.

items.question: What if I encounter a bug or technical issue?
items.answer: Please contact us through our contact page or reach out via our social media channels. We're committed to fixing issues quickly and appreciate your feedback!

items.question: What is EgraTor Browser?
items.answer: EgraTor is a modern desktop browser built on Electron and Chromium, featuring a beautiful neumorphism design and powerful tools for productivity and gaming.

items.question: How can I download EgraTor Browser?
items.answer: Visit our EgraTor page (/egrator) to download the latest release directly from GitHub. Available for Windows, macOS, and Linux operating systems.

items.question: Is EgraTor Browser free?
items.answer: Yes, EgraTor Browser is completely free and open-source. You can download and use it without any cost or subscription.

items.question: What features does EgraTor Browser have?
items.answer: EgraTor includes AI Assistant, password manager, bookmarks, downloads, notes, split view, extensions support, and many productivity tools. Check the EgraTor page for full feature list.

items.question: Does EgraTor work on all operating systems?
items.answer: EgraTor is available for Windows, macOS, and Linux. Visit the EgraTor download page to get the version for your operating system.

items.question: Is my data secure with EgraTor?
items.answer: EgraTor uses electron-store for secure local data storage. Your passwords, bookmarks, and personal data are stored locally on your device and never transmitted to external servers.

items.question: Can I sync data across devices?
items.answer: Currently, EgraTor stores data locally on each device. Cloud sync features may be added in future updates based on user feedback and demand.

items.question: How do I install extensions in EgraTor?
items.answer: EgraTor supports extensions similar to Chromium browsers. You can install extensions through the Extensions menu in the right panel.

items.question: Does EgraTor support developer tools?
items.answer: Yes! Press F12 or use the Dev Mode action to access developer tools for web development and debugging.

items.question: Will you release more desktop apps?
items.answer: We're always exploring new ideas and technologies. Stay connected with us to be the first to know about new application releases!

items.question: How can I contact CrystalGames Studio?
items.answer: You can reach us through our contact page (/contact), via email, or through our social media channels on X and YouTube. We'd love to hear from you!

items.question: Do you have a community or Discord server?
items.answer: Yes! We have a WhatsApp community channel where you can chat with other players, get updates, and connect with the team. Find the link on our contact page.

items.question: Can I use your content for my projects?
items.answer: Our games and applications are protected by copyright. For usage rights, licensing, or partnership inquiries, please contact us through our contact page.

items.question: How do you handle user privacy?
items.answer: We take privacy seriously. Check our Privacy Policy page for detailed information about how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

items.question: What are your terms of service?
items.answer: You can read our complete Terms of Service on our Terms page. These outline the rules and guidelines for using our games and services.

items.question: Do you offer refunds for in-game purchases?
items.answer: Refund policies depend on the platform and purchase method. Contact us through our support channels, and we'll help you with any refund requests.

items.question: Can I report inappropriate content or behavior?
items.answer: Absolutely. If you encounter any inappropriate content or behavior in our games or community, please report it immediately through our contact page.

items.question: Do you have a newsletter or mailing list?
items.answer: Stay updated by following our social media channels and joining our WhatsApp community. We share all major announcements and updates there.

items.question: How do I unsubscribe from communications?
items.answer: If you've subscribed to any of our communications, you can unsubscribe by following the link in the email or contacting us directly through our contact page.

items.question: Do you have a bug bounty or security program?
items.answer: We take security seriously. If you discover a security vulnerability, please contact us immediately through our contact page with details, and we'll address it promptly.

goodBuy.headline: Ready to Start Your Journey?
goodBuy.subheadline: Join our community and discover amazing games and apps crafted with passion and innovation!

quote.text: CrystalGames Studio brings innovation and fun together in every product!
